pages.title: Creative Logic Motor
pages.text: A Lua-controlled $(thing)rotation source$() with unlimited stress capacity. Set speed from -256 to 256 RPM via code, and program multi-step sequences for precise motion control.$(br2)Peripheral type: $(thing)"creative_logic_motor"$()
Place next to a CC:Tweaked Computer to access the peripheral.

pages.title: Speed Control
pages.text: $(li)$(thing)setSpeed(speed)$() — set RPM (-256 to 256)$(br)$(li)$(thing)getSpeed()$() → int — target speed$(br)$(li)$(thing)getActualSpeed()$() → float — real network speed$(br)$(li)$(thing)enable()$() — start generating rotation$(br)$(li)$(thing)disable()$() — stop rotation$(br)$(li)$(thing)stop()$() — set speed to 0 and disable$(br)$(li)$(thing)isEnabled()$() → boolean$(br)$(li)$(thing)isRunning()$() → boolean — enabled AND speed ≠ 0$(br2)$(bold)Example:$()$(br)$(#4488CC)local m = peripheral.find("creative_logic_motor")$(br)m.setSpeed(128)$(br)m.enable()$()

pages.title: Sequence Programming
pages.text: Build multi-step motion sequences:$(br2)$(li)$(thing)clearSequence()$() — clear all steps$(br)$(li)$(thing)addRotateStep(degrees, speed)$() — rotate by degrees at speed (1-256)$(br)$(li)$(thing)addWaitStep(ticks)$() — pause (1-6000 ticks)$(br)$(li)$(thing)addSpeedStep(speed)$() — instant speed change$(br)$(li)$(thing)runSequence(loop)$() — execute (loop=true to repeat)$(br)$(li)$(thing)stopSequence()$() — halt sequence$(br)$(li)$(thing)isSequenceRunning()$() → boolean$(br)$(li)$(thing)getSequenceSize()$() → int — queued steps

pages.title: Sequence Example
pages.text: $(bold)Rotate 90° back and forth:$()$(br2)$(#4488CC)local m = peripheral.find("creative_logic_motor")$(br)m.clearSequence()$(br)m.addRotateStep(90, 64)$(br)m.addWaitStep(20)$(br)m.addRotateStep(-90, 64)$(br)m.addWaitStep(20)$(br)m.runSequence(true)$()$(br2)Each $(thing)addRotateStep$() turns the shaft by exact degrees. Positive speed = clockwise, negative = counter-clockwise.
